---
title: Raw Transaction Estimate
description: Estimate the gas required for a raw EVM transaction using the Okto Gateway. This endpoint provides an estimate of the gas required to execute a custom EVM transaction.
full: false
---

import { Callout } from 'fumadocs-ui/components/callout';
import CollapsibleCallout from 'app/components/mdx/CollapsibleCallout';
import { Tab, Tabs } from 'fumadocs-ui/components/tabs';
import DevTools from 'app/components/mdx/DevTools';

<DevTools />

## POST Request

### Endpoint

```bash
POST https://sandbox-api.okto.tech/api/oc/v1/estimate
```

### Headers

| Name | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| Content-Type | string | Must be `application/json` |
| Authorization | string | Bearer token for authentication |

### Request Body

```json
{
  "type": "RAW_TRANSACTION",
  "jobId": "string",
  "gasDetails": {
    "maxFeePerGas": "string",
    "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "string"
  },
  "paymasterData": "string",
  "details": {
    "caip2Id": "string",
    "transactions": [
      {
        "data": "string",
        "from": "string",
        "to": "string",
        "value": "string"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

<CollapsibleCallout type="tip" title="Request Parameters">
- `type`: The type of intent, must be "RAW_TRANSACTION"
- `jobId`: Unique identifier for the estimation job
- `gasDetails`: Gas fee parameters
  - `maxFeePerGas`: Maximum fee per gas unit
  - `maxPriorityFeePerGas`: Maximum priority fee per gas unit
- `paymasterData`: Data required for paymaster operations
- `details`: Transaction details
  - `caip2Id`: Chain identifier (e.g., "eip155:137" for Polygon)
  - `transactions`: Array of transaction objects
    - `data`: The transaction data (hex string)
    - `from`: Sender's address
    - `to`: Recipient's address
    - `value`: Amount of native token to send (hex string)
</CollapsibleCallout>

## Response

<Tabs items={['200 Success', '400 Bad Request']}>
<Tab value="200 Success">

```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "details": {
      "estimation": {
        "amount": "1"
      },
      "fees": {
        "transactionFees": {
          "<caip2id>": "string"
        },
        "approxTransactionFeesInUSDT": "string"
      }
    },
    "callData": {
      "intentType": "RAW_TRANSACTION",
      "jobId": "string",
      "vendorId": "string",
      "creatorId": "string",
      "policies": {
        "isGsnEnabled": boolean,
        "isSponsorshipEnabled": boolean
      },
      "gsn": {
        "isPossible": boolean,
        "isRequired": boolean,
        "requiredNetworks": [string],
        "tokens": [string]
      },
      "payload": {
        "caip2Id": "string",
        "transactions": [
          {
            "data": "string",
            "from": "string",
            "to": "string",
            "value": "string"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "userOps": {
      "sender": "string",
      "nonce": "string",
      "callData": "string",
      "callGasLimit": "string",
      "verificationGasLimit": "string",
      "preVerificationGas": "string",
      "maxFeePerGas": "string",
      "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "string",
      "paymaster": "string",
      "paymasterVerificationGasLimit": "string",
      "paymasterPostOpGasLimit": "string",
      "paymasterData": "string"
    }
  }
}
```

</Tab>

<Tab value="400 Bad Request">

```json
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "string",
  "code": "string"
}
```

</Tab>
</Tabs>

## Example

<Tabs items={['cURL', 'JavaScript', 'Go', 'Python']}>
<Tab value="cURL">

```bash
curl -X POST "https://sandbox-api.okto.tech/api/oc/v1/estimate" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <your-token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "type": "RAW_TRANSACTION",
    "jobId": "4f858322-c613-439b-ad73-9ab85dea5382",
    "gasDetails": {
      "maxFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400",
      "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400"
    },
    "paymasterData": "",
    "details": {
      "caip2Id": "eip155:137",
      "transactions": [
        {
          "data": "",
          "from": "0x0058277dfC89a0E546BDc0949A35d610c8a7d987",
          "to": "0xD6d06Cf01cb1316E813dCeFE0a7A2558a3FAEAc1",
          "value": "0x0"
        }
      ]
    }
  }'
```

</Tab>

<Tab value="JavaScript">

```javascript
fetch("https://sandbox-api.okto.tech/api/oc/v1/estimate", {
  headers: {
    "Authorization": "Bearer <your-token>",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
  },
  body: JSON.stringify({
    "type": "RAW_TRANSACTION",
    "jobId": "4f858322-c613-439b-ad73-9ab85dea5382",
    "gasDetails": {
      "maxFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400",
      "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400"
    },
    "paymasterData": "",
    "details": {
      "caip2Id": "eip155:137",
      "transactions": [
        {
          "data": "",
          "from": "0x0058277dfC89a0E546BDc0949A35d610c8a7d987",
          "to": "0xD6d06Cf01cb1316E813dCeFE0a7A2558a3FAEAc1",
          "value": "0x0"
        }
      ]
    }
  })
});
```

</Tab>

<Tab value="Go">

```go
package main
 
import (
  "fmt"
  "net/http"
  "io/ioutil"
  "strings"
)
 
func main() {
  url := "https://sandbox-api.okto.tech/api/oc/v1/estimate"
  payload := strings.NewReader(`{
    "type": "RAW_TRANSACTION",
    "jobId": "4f858322-c613-439b-ad73-9ab85dea5382",
    "gasDetails": {
      "maxFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400",
      "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400"
    },
    "paymasterData": "",
    "details": {
      "caip2Id": "eip155:137",
      "transactions": [
        {
          "data": "",
          "from": "0x0058277dfC89a0E546BDc0949A35d610c8a7d987",
          "to": "0xD6d06Cf01cb1316E813dCeFE0a7A2558a3FAEAc1",
          "value": "0x0"
        }
      ]
    }
  }`)
  
  req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)
  req.Header.Add("Authorization", "Bearer <your-token>")
  req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")
  res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
  defer res.Body.Close()
  body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)
 
  fmt.Println(res)
  fmt.Println(string(body))
}
```

</Tab>

<Tab value="Python">

```python
import requests
 
url = "https://sandbox-api.okto.tech/api/oc/v1/estimate"
json = {
  "type": "RAW_TRANSACTION",
  "jobId": "4f858322-c613-439b-ad73-9ab85dea5382",
  "gasDetails": {
    "maxFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400",
    "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400"
  },
  "paymasterData": "",
  "details": {
    "caip2Id": "eip155:137",
    "transactions": [
      {
        "data": "",
        "from": "0x0058277dfC89a0E546BDc0949A35d610c8a7d987",
        "to": "0xD6d06Cf01cb1316E813dCeFE0a7A2558a3FAEAc1",
        "value": "0x0"
      }
    ]
  }
}
headers = {
  "Authorization": "Bearer <your-token>"
}
response = requests.request("POST", url, json=json, headers=headers)
 
print(response.text)
```

</Tab>
</Tabs>

## Response Examples

<Tabs items={['200 Success', '400 Bad Request']}>
<Tab value="200 Success">

```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "details": {
      "estimation": {
        "amount": "1"
      },
      "fees": {
        "transactionFees": {
          "<caip2id>": "string"
        },
        "approxTransactionFeesInUSDT": "string"
      }
    },
    "callData": {
      "intentType": "RAW_TRANSACTION",
      "jobId": "0a043a1a-5157-483a-b2b6-8f124c9d0455",
      "vendorId": "0x6b6Fad2600Bc57075ee560A6fdF362FfefB9dC3C",
      "creatorId": "0xE14A85291F6A8DE60dC06b2dD373DfFDa779AF8D",
      "policies": {
        "isGsnEnabled": false,
        "isSponsorshipEnabled": false
      },
      "gsn": {
        "isPossible": false,
        "isRequired": false,
        "requiredNetworks": [null],
        "tokens": [null]
      },
      "payload": {
        "caip2Id": "eip155:137",
        "transactions": [
          {
            "data": "",
            "from": "0x0058277dfC89a0E546BDc0949A35d610c8a7d987",
            "to": "0xD6d06Cf01cb1316E813dCeFE0a7A2558a3FAEAc1",
            "value": "0x0"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "userOps": {
      "sender": "0xe14a85291f6a8de60dc06b2dd373dffda779af8d",
      "nonce": "0x000000000000000000000000000000000a043a1a5157483ab2b68f124c9d0455",
      "callData": "",
      "callGasLimit": "0x484f6",
      "verificationGasLimit": "0x16c6c",
      "preVerificationGas": "0x15500",
      "maxFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400",
      "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0xBA43B7400",
      "paymaster": "0x9b34131837d534cd199c0b8fdd8347c05e21a2d8",
      "paymasterVerificationGasLimit": "0x5489",
      "paymasterPostOpGasLimit": "0x1",
      "paymasterData": ""
    }
  }
}
```

</Tab>

<Tab value="400 Bad Request">

```json
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "Invalid request parameters",
  "code": "INVALID_PARAMETERS"
}
```

</Tab>
</Tabs>
